customrecordcustomfield.defaultvalue: Configure the services you've selected for your company.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Directional Text Config

customrecordcustomfield.defaultvalue: Select the company you wish to configure operational services for.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Primary Information Message

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select the subsidiary/company that you want to register
customrecordcustomfield.label: Company

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is the subsidiary's legal name, which has already been registered on NetSuite. It must be the name as incorporated/registered.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Registered Company Name

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is the subsidiary's preferred currency, which has already been registered on NetSuite.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Base Currency

customrecordcustomfield.help: Select a person to be the subsidiary's main contact.
customrecordcustomfield.label: MAIN CONTACT NAME

customrecordcustomfield.help: This is the main contact's email address, which has already been registered on NetSuite. We'll send any alerts or notifications to this person.
customrecordcustomfield.label: MAIN CONTACT EMAIL

customrecordcustomfield.help: Please provide a contact number for the main contact.
customrecordcustomfield.label: MAIN CONTACT MOBILE
Blank Space Bill Payments

'

Let us know the following to start using Bill Payments.

'
customrecordcustomfield.label: Invoice Payment Message

customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box if your payment application will require approval. With approval routing, once a request has been made, it will need to be completed by a company approver usually a manager. Please make sure that you know who your company approver is.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Approval Routing

customrecordcustomfield.help: With approval routing, once an application has been made, it will need to be completed by your company's approver. Please make sure that you know who your company approver is.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Default Approver Role

customrecordcustomfield.help: This account will be charged for all bill payments.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Default Bank Account
Column Space

customrecordcustomfield.defaultvalue: Enter the information below to enable TWC-Buyer Loans.
customrecordcustomfield.label: TWC Buyer Message

customrecordcustomfield.help: Check this box if your Trade Working Capital Loan applications will require approval. With approval routing, once a request has been made, it will need to be completed by a company approver usually a manager. Please make sure that you know who your company approver is.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Approval Routing

customrecordcustomfield.help: Every new Trade Working Capital Loan application will need to be completed by your company's approver usually a manager. Please make sure that you know who your company approver is.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Default TWC Approver Role Buyer

customrecordcustomfield.defaultvalue: Let us know your trade account information here. All fields are mandatory.
customrecordcustomfield.label: Trade Account Buyer Msg

customrecordcustomfield.help: Define the default other current liabity account
customrecordcustomfield.label: Default Bank Account Seller
column space 4
Default Other Current Liability Account Seller
column space 5

customrecordcustomfield.defaultvalue:
The Automated Accounting Entries feature allows all Trade Working Capital loans liability, expenses and interest accrual information to auto populate into your financial reports in your Oracle NetSuite instance.
By checking this box, you fully authorise HSBC to populate this information in your financial reports and you confirm that you have read, understood, and accept the Terms and Conditions which can be accessed and read here. You can revoke this feature at any time following which you will have to manually make entries towards Trade Working Capital loans liability, expenses and interest accruals in your financial reports.
customrecordcustomfield.label: TWC Buyer AJE T and C

customrecordcustomfield.defaultvalue:
The Automated Accounting Entries feature allows all Trade Working Capital loans liability, expenses and interest accrual information to auto populate into your financial reports in your Oracle NetSuite instance.
By checking this box, you fully authorise HSBC to populate this information in your financial reports and you confirm that you have read, understood, and accept the Terms and Conditions which can be accessed and read here. You can revoke this feature at any time following which you will have to manually make entries towards Trade Working Capital loans liability, expenses and interest accruals in your financial reports.
customrecordcustomfield.label: TWC Seller AJE T and C
